Bindings.Binding: local b,E={1,2,3,4},unpack(ElvUI)for _,n in pairs(b)do local s=E.db.actionbar["bar"..n].visibility;E.db.actionbar["bar"..n].visibility=(s=="hide" and "show" or "hide")E.ActionBars:PositionAndSizeBar("bar"..n)end
LoadAddOn("Blizzard_WeeklyRewards"); if WeeklyRewardsFrame:IsShown() then WeeklyRewardsFrame:Hide() else WeeklyRewardsFrame:Show() end
